pricing.title: Farashi mai sauƙi kuma bayyananne
pricing.subtitle: Babu kuɗaɗen ɓoye. Za ka iya soke a kowane lokaci.

hero.title: Shaidar tasiri da albarkatu don hanzarta kaddamar da WhatsApp
hero.subtitle: Ga yadda kungiyoyi masu tsauraran ka'idoji ke amfani da WhatsApp Bot Builder kuma ku sauke playbook ɗin da muke amfani da su a aikace.

stats.label: Lokacin matsakaici zuwa bot ɗin farko

partners.title: Masu dogaro da mu
partners.subtitle: Kungiyoyi na lafiya, kasuwanci da SaaS a cikin EU
partners.description: Sassan Compliance, CX da Growth suna amfani da WhatsApp Bot Builder a matsayin ginshiƙin tsarin atomatik ɗinsu.

caseStudies.title: Yadda muke bayar da sakamako mai aunawa
caseStudies.subtitle: Kowane case study yana haɗa sadarwa mai bin doka da biyan kuɗi, analytics da KPI masu auna nasara.

healthcare.title: Triage ta atomatik a asibitoci 7
healthcare.description: Tambayoyin marasa lafiya ana tantance su gaba, ana turawa ga ƙungiyar da ta dace kuma ana rikodin su ba tare da aikin hannu ba.
metrics: Lokacin amsa hotline ya ragu da 38%
Tambayoyi 1,200 na alƙawari a kowane wata
healthcare.result: DPA, ikon wucewa da handover zuwa ma'aikata sun kammala cikin ƙasa da makonni biyu.

retail.title: Checkout ta tattaunawa ga alamar kaya
retail.description: Shawarwari na samfur, biyan kuɗi da bin diddigin jigilar kaya suna gudana a WhatsApp yayin da Stripe da PayPal ke bibiyar ma'amala.
retail.result: Playbooks suna haɗa data samfur, rubutu na harsuna da dama da dashboard na kasuwanci.

agency.title: Sabis na white-label mai auna
agency.description: Hukumar dijital ta gabatar da bots 18 a cikin makonni shida tare da branding, invoicing da dashboard na nasara.
agency.result: Workflows na n8n masu sake amfani da su da tsarin Supabase suna ba da damar isarwa cikin sauri.

resources.title: Albarkatu masu saukewa don hanzarta isarwa
resources.subtitle: Ana sabunta kowace albarkatu kowane kwata da sabbin samfura, jerin duba da dabarun atomatik daga ayyukan abokan ciniki.

items.title: Enterprise rollout playbook
items.description: Jagorar mataki-by-mataki don ƙungiyoyin shari'a, samfur da ayyuka.
highlights: Checklist ta gudanarwa ga WhatsApp Business API
Samfuran sadarwa da masu ruwa da tsaki

items.title: GDPR da biyan kuɗi compliance kit
items.description: Tarin takardun TOM, samfuran DPA da misalan invoice masu bin ƙa'ida.
highlights: Samfuran TOM da AV da aka cika
Tsarin invoice tare da dokar ƙaramar kasuwanci
Amsoshi ga tambayoyin tsaro na yau da kullum

items.title: Automation recipes don n8n & Supabase
items.description: Taron flows masu amfani da yawa don rarraba leads, kunna biyan kuɗi da dawo da biyan kuɗi.
highlights: Ƙananan bayanai na SQL na Supabase don bin kwota
Checklist ta gwaji don hanyoyin biyan kuɗi na madadin

items.title: Dakin karatu na sako masu harsuna da dama
items.description: Templates da aka amince da su don onboarding, tallafi da biyan kuɗi da harshen Jamusanci, Ingilishi da Faransanci.
highlights: Saƙonni 12 na tunatar da biyan kuɗi

resources.assuranceHeadline: Kowane albarkatu ya wuce gwaji a kan abokan ciniki
resources.assuranceSubtitle: Muna raba audit trail, KPI da darussa don WhatsApp automation mai auna.
assurance: Sabuntawa na kowane kwata daga retros na abokan ciniki
Binciken ƙungiyoyin shari'a, compliance da success
Kamance da ake kwatanta cikin lafiya, kasuwanci da SaaS
resources.assuranceCtaLabel: Yi magana da masani na mafita

testimonials.title: Dalilin da yasa kungiyoyi ke amfani da mu
testimonials.subtitle: Shugabannin CX, ayyuka da compliance suna bayyana ROI da suke sa ido a kai.

items.quote: Playbooks masu zurfi sun ceci makonni na daidaiton ciki. Kowane ɓangare ya san abin da za a yi tun daga rana ta farko.
items.name: Leonie Hartmann
items.role: Shugabar Sabis ɗin Marasa lafiya, Klinikverbund Nord

items.quote: Mun sake amfani da recipes kuma mun kaddamar da hanyoyin biyan kuɗi na ƙasashe da dama ba tare da ƙarin lambar haɗi ba.
items.name: André Becker

items.quote: Abokan ciniki suna amincewa da sauri saboda muna nuna takardun compliance, rubutun GDPR da misalan invoice nan da nan.
items.name: Noemi Alvarez

cta.title: Shirye don irin waɗannan sakamakon?

ai.title: Yana goyon bayan AI

nocode.title: Babu Code

caseStudies.title: Sakamakon gaskiya daga abokan ciniki
caseStudies.subtitle: Masana'antar lafiya, e-commerce da hukumomi suna amfani da dandamalinmu don sarrafa WhatsApp cikin aminci

healthcare.headline: Rarraba marasa lafiya ta atomatik ga cibiyar asibitoci
healthcare.description: Bot yana amsa tambayoyi da aka saba yi, yana tace bukatun alƙawari kuma yana rage nauyin layin kira.
metrics: An rage lokacin jiran layin waya da kashi 38%
Alƙawura 1,200 a kowane wata ana sarrafa su ba tare da hannu ba
healthcare.result: An kaddamar cikin kwanaki 14 tare da DPA, sarrafa matsayin mai amfani da rikodin sa ido.

retail.headline: Siyayya ta tattaunawa ga kamfanin tufafi na D2C
retail.description: WhatsApp yana jagorantar mai siye daga shawarar samfur zuwa biyan kuɗi da bin diddigin jigilar kaya awanni 24.
metrics: Karuwa da kashi 23% wajen dawo da jakunkuna da aka bari
€8.4k ƙarin kuɗin shiga na wata saboda upsell ta atomatik
retail.result: Stripe, PayPal, Apple Pay da Klarna suna aiki kai tsaye ba tare da aikin hannu ba.

agency.headline: Tayen white-label mai auna kai ga hukumar dijital
agency.description: An kaddamar da bot 18 ga abokan ciniki cikin makonni shida tare da tambari, rahoto da lissafi masu hade.
metrics: Ƙaruwa da kashi 35% a kudaden sabis saboda SLA ta atomatik
agency.result: Gudanar da abokan ciniki masu yawa, tallafi da nazari ana sarrafa su daga dashboard guda.

testimonials.title: Abokan ciniki suna ba da shaida
testimonials.subtitle: Kungiyoyin CX, e-commerce da SaaS a faɗin Turai

points.speed: An kaddamar da mafita cikin 'yan kwanaki maimakon watanni na haɓaka
points.compliance: Jerinan duba GDPR, DPA da takardun TOM suna zuwa tare da tsarin
points.support: Manaja na nasara daga shirin Professional

agency.quote: Mun fitar da bot ɗin abokin ciniki na farko cikin kwanaki goma sha ɗaya. Yanzu muna samun sabbin kwangila a duk mako ba tare da ƙara ma'aikata ba.
agency.name: Julia Kramer
agency.metric: +23% ƙarin jagora masu inganci cikin watan farko

retail.quote: Bot yana kula da shawarwarin samfur, matsayi na isarwa da biyan kuɗi. Ƙungiyar tallafinmu yanzu tana da lokaci don tattaunawar da ke samar da kuɗi.
retail.name: Leonard Fischer
retail.metric: Ajiye awanni 18 na aikin hannu a kowane mako

saas.quote: Muna tsara hanyoyin onboarding a kasuwanni uku lokaci guda. Haɗin n8n, Supabase da Apple Pay shi ne ya sa muka canza.
saas.name: Mira Albrecht
saas.role: Daraktan Nasarar Abokin Ciniki, Finovate SaaS

security.title: Tsaro da bin doka daga tushe
security.subtitle: Gine-ginen da aka ajiye a EU tare da binciken masu zaman kansu da takardu masu gaskiya
features: Gudanar da biyan kuɗi na PCI DSS Level 1 ta Stripe da PayPal
Tsaron TLS daga ƙarshe zuwa ƙarshe tare da adanawa mai zaman kanta idan an buƙata
Rajistan rijistar bincike da ba za a iya canzawa ba, amincewa bisa matsayin aiki da sa ido kan aiki
security.assuranceTitle: Abin da zaku iya dogaro da shi
assurance: Hosting a Frankfurt (eu-central-1) tare da ajiyar bayanai na yau da kullum
Yarjejeniyar sarrafa bayanai da takardun TOM a shirye don sa hannu
Gwaje-gwajen tsaro na kowane kwata da binciken tsaro na kai tsaye

header.title: Farashi a bayyane
header.subtitle: Zaɓi shirin da ya dace da ƙungiyar ku. Dukkan matakai suna bin GDPR kuma ana adana su a EU.

onboarding.title: Fara da matakai uku
onboarding.subtitle: Mai taimako zai kai ku daga rajista zuwa bot ɗin farko a kan layi.

account.title: 1. Ƙirƙiri asusu kuma gayyaci ƙungiya
account.description: Yi rajista, ƙara bayanan kamfani kuma ka bai wa mambobi izini.

connect.title: 2. Haɗa WhatsApp
connect.description: Zaɓi Meta Business Account, tabbatar da webhook kuma kunna hanyoyin biyan kuɗi.

launch.title: 3. Fitar da bot ɗin farko
launch.description: Zaɓi samfur, gyara abun ciki kuma ka tura shi a kan layi.

onboarding.footnote: Ba a buƙatar katin kuɗi. Gwada duk fasaloli har tsawon kwanaki 14.

roi.title: Kimanta ribar ku
roi.subtitle: Ga yadda kuɗin kai tsaye da tanadin lokaci ke ba da shawara kan matakin da ya dace.

help.leads: Haɗa dukkan jagororin WhatsApp, hira ko fom da kuke sarrafawa yanzu.
help.supportTickets: Adadin tikitin tallafi da ƙungiyar ku ke magancewa a kowane wata.

results.monthlyBenefitLabel: Fa'ida da ake tsammani a kowane wata
results.disclaimer: Wannan ƙididdiga ce ta kimantawa — daidaita zuwa yanayin kasuwancin ku.
results.recommendedPlanDescription: Da kusan saƙonni {messages} a wata wannan mataki ya fi dacewa.
results.planCustom: Ana samun farashi na musamman ta hanyar ƙungiyarmu.
results.roiMultiple: ≈ {multiple}x ROI idan kuna amfani da shirin da aka ba da shawara
results.coveredBySavings: Tanadin tallafi ya rufe kuɗin shirin gaba ɗaya.

rag.chatDescription: AI tana amsawa ne kawai bisa tushen ilimi da aka ƙara.
rag.emptyChatHint: AI na iya amfani da bayanai daga tushen da aka ƙara kawai.

auth.invalidEmailMessage: Da fatan shigar da adireshin imel daidai.

emailVerificationFailed.title: Tabbatarwar Imel Ya Gaza
emailVerificationFailed.description: Hanyar tabbatarwa ba ta aiki ko ta ƙare. Wannan zai iya faruwa idan:
emailVerificationFailed.reason1: An riga an yi amfani da hanyar sau ɗaya
emailVerificationFailed.reason2: An jira hanyar da yawa (fiye da sa'o'i 24)
emailVerificationFailed.reason3: Hanyar tana nuna zuwa yankin da ba daidai ba
emailVerificationFailed.resendPrompt: Kuna son karɓar sabuwar imel ta tabbatarwa a {email}?
emailVerificationFailed.enterEmail: Shigar da adireshin imel ɗin ku don karɓar sabuwar imel ta tabbatarwa:
emailVerificationFailed.resendSuccessMessage: Da fatan duba akwatin saƙonnin ku don sabuwar hanyar tabbatarwa.
emailVerificationFailed.resendError: Ba za a iya aika imel ba sake.
emailVerificationFailed.enterEmailError: Da fatan shigar da adireshin imel ɗin ku.
emailVerificationFailed.invalidEmailMessage: Da fatan shigar da adireshin imel daidai.
emailVerificationFailed.genericError: Kuskure da ba a zata ba ya faru.
emailVerificationFailed.supabaseConfigMessage: Idan hanyar tana nuna zuwa localhost:3000, URL na rukunin yanar gizo a Dashboard na Supabase dole ne a canza shi zuwa https://whatsapp.owona.de.

dashboard.noFilteredBots: Babu bot da ta dace da tacewar yanzu.

errors.generic: Wani abu ya ɓace. Da fatan sake gwadawa.

support.title: Ƙirƙiri tikitin tallafi

statusOverview.heading: Matakai na gaba
statusOverview.personal: Muna keɓance amsoshi kuma muna daidaita su da halin tikitin ka na yanzu.
statusOverview.escalation: Bayan amsarka ta farko, muna turawa ta atomatik zuwa Tier 2.
statusOverview.updates: Za ka sami sabuntawar matsayi kai tsaye idan wani abu ya canza.

form.title: Take
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Me ya faru? Da fatan a saka matakan da aka bi ko hanyoyin haɗi.
form.metadataNotice: Bayanan fasaha (browser, shafi, lokaci) za su tafi ta atomatik domin taimaka wa bincike.

success.title: An aika tikitin
success.message: Mun gode! Ƙungiyar tallafinmu za ta tuntube ka nan ba da jimawa ba.
success.nextSteps: Za ka karɓi tabbaci nan ba da jimawa ba kuma za mu aika sabuntawa da zarar Tier 2 ta fara aiki da tikitin.

errors.requiredMessage: Da fatan za a cike dukkan filayen dole kafin a tura tikitin.
errors.submitMessage: Da fatan a sake gwadawa ko a tuntube mu ta imel.

inbox.title: Akwatin tallafi
inbox.subtitle: Bi diddigin takardun tambayarka kuma yi magana kai tsaye da ƙungiyar tallafi.
inbox.emptyDescription: Madalla! Idan wani abu ya samu matsala, danna "Bayar da rahoton matsala" kuma za mu shiga tsakani.

company.title: WhatsApp Bot Builder
company.description: Ƙirƙiri WhatsApp Business Bots masu bin DSGVO waɗanda AI ke sarrafawa ba tare da code ba. Maganin chatbot na ƙwararru na kasuwancin ku.
company.copyright: WhatsApp Bot Builder. Duk haƙƙoƙin da aka keɓe.

footer.disclaimer: Wannan aikace-aikacen don ƙirƙirar WhatsApp Business chatbots ne. Amfani a kan haɗarin ku.

badges.comingSoon: Zai iso ba da jimawa ba

trust.heading: Biyan kuɗi mai kariya
trust.subheading: Dukkan ma'amaloli ana sarrafa su cikin ɓoye ta Stripe & PayPal
items: Bin ka'idar PCI DSS Mataki na 1 da 3D Secure 2
Apple Pay, Google Pay da tabbacin ɗan yatsa/ fuska
Ragowar kuɗi da bayanan abokan ciniki suna ajiye a EU bisa GDPR
trust.footerNote: Ana sarrafa ta Stripe & PayPal – kariya ta 256-bit TLS
